rooms.description: Open space with tiled floor and natural light from front-facing windows.
Spacious area with high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight and ventilation. Vastu-aligned east-west orientation.
Adjacent to the living room with natural light from large windows, suitable for gatherings.
Traditional Kerala style kitchen featuring tiled flooring and integrated storage. Natural light from a skylight and side windows.
Quiet study area with extensive shelving, floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light.
Cozy bedroom with large windows ensuring ventilation and morning light. Vastu-compliant north or east orientation.
Master suite featuring an ensuite bathroom, dressing area, and large windows for bright interiors. North-east oriented per Vastu norms.
Additional bedroom with natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Compliant with ventilation requirements.
Additional bedroom featuring integrated storage and ample daylight via large windows.
Functional bathroom for guests, designed with water-saving fixtures and natural light from frosted windows.

openings.description: Stately entrance door with Kerala wood carvings.
Functional exit leading to the garden area, ensuring cross-ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling window for living room with optimal natural light and ventilation.
Large window in the library ensuring ample daylight and air circulation.
Roof skylight over the kitchen to supplement natural lighting during daytime.
